name: align-content
desc: Specifies the alignment of flexible container's items within the flex container.

name: align-items
desc: Specifies the default alignment for items within the flex container.

name: align-self
desc: Specifies the alignment for selected items within the flex container.

name: animation
desc: Specifies the keyframe-based animations.

name: animation-delay
desc: Specifies when the animation will start.

name: animation-direction
desc: Specifies whether the animation should play in reverse on alternate cycles or not.

name: animation-duration
desc: Specifies the number of seconds or milliseconds an animation should take to complete one cycle.

name: animation-fill-mode
desc: Specifies how a CSS animation should apply styles to its target before and after it is executing.

name: animation-iteration-count
desc: Specifies the number of times an animation cycle should be played before stopping.

name: animation-name
desc: Specifies the name of @keyframes defined animations that should be applied to the selected element.

name: animation-play-state
desc: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused.

name: animation-timing-function
desc: Specifies how a CSS animation should progress over the duration of each cycle.

name: backface-visibility
desc: Specifies whether or not the "back" side of a transformed element is visible when facing the user.

name: background
desc: Defines a variety of background properties within one declaration.

name: background-attachment
desc: Specify whether the background image is fixed in the viewport or scrolls.

name: background-clip
desc: Specifies the painting area of the background.

name: background-color
desc: Defines an element's background color.

name: background-image
desc: Defines an element's background image.

name: background-origin
desc: Specifies the positioning area of the background images.

name: background-position
desc: Defines the origin of a background image.

name: background-repeat
desc: Specify whether/how the background image is tiled.

name: background-size
desc: Specifies the size of the background images.

name: border
desc: Sets the width, style, and color for all four sides of an element's border.

name: border-bottom
desc: Sets the width, style, and color of the bottom border of an element.

name: border-bottom-color
desc: Sets the color of the bottom border of an element.

name: border-bottom-left-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the bottom-left border corner of an element.

name: border-bottom-right-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the bottom-right border corner of an element.

name: border-bottom-style
desc: Sets the style of the bottom border of an element.

name: border-bottom-width
desc: Sets the width of the bottom border of an element.

name: border-collapse
desc: Specifies whether table cell borders are connected or separated.

name: border-color
desc: Sets the color of the border on all the four sides of an element.

name: border-image
desc: Specifies how an image is to be used in place of the border styles.

name: border-image-outset
desc: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box.

name: border-image-repeat
desc: Specifies whether the image-border should be repeated, rounded or stretched.

name: border-image-slice
desc: Specifies the inward offsets of the image-border.

name: border-image-source
desc: Specifies the location of the image to be used as a border.

name: border-image-width
desc: Specifies the width of the image-border.

name: border-left
desc: Sets the width, style, and color of the left border of an element.

name: border-left-color
desc: Sets the color of the left border of an element.

name: border-left-style
desc: Sets the style of the left border of an element.

name: border-left-width
desc: Sets the width of the left border of an element.

name: border-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the border corners of an element.

name: border-right
desc: Sets the width, style, and color of the right border of an element.

name: border-right-color
desc: Sets the color of the right border of an element.

name: border-right-style
desc: Sets the style of the right border of an element.

name: border-right-width
desc: Sets the width of the right border of an element.

name: border-spacing
desc: Sets the spacing between the borders of adjacent table cells.

name: border-style
desc: Sets the style of the border on all the four sides of an element.

name: border-top
desc: Sets the width, style, and color of the top border of an element.

name: border-top-color
desc: Sets the color of the top border of an element.

name: border-top-left-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the top-left border corner of an element.

name: border-top-right-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the top-right border corner of an element.

name: border-top-style
desc: Sets the style of the top border of an element.

name: border-top-width
desc: Sets the width of the top border of an element.

name: border-width
desc: Sets the width of the border on all the four sides of an element.

name: bottom
desc: Specify the location of the bottom edge of the positioned element.

name: box-shadow
desc: Applies one or more drop-shadows to the element's box.

name: box-sizing
desc: Alter the default CSS box model.

name: caption-side
desc: Specify the position of table's caption.

name: clear
desc: Specifies the placement of an element in relation to floating elements.

name: clip
desc: Defines the clipping region.

name: color
desc: Specify the color of the text of an element.

name: column-count
desc: Specifies the number of columns in a multi-column element.

name: column-fill
desc: Specifies how columns will be filled.

name: column-gap
desc: Specifies the gap between the columns in a multi-column element.

name: column-rule
desc: Specifies a straight line, or "rule", to be drawn between each column in a multi-column element.

name: column-rule-color
desc: Specifies the color of the rules drawn between columns in a multi-column layout.

name: column-rule-style
desc: Specifies the style of the rule drawn between the columns in a multi-column layout.

name: column-rule-width
desc: Specifies the width of the rule drawn between the columns in a multi-column layout.

name: column-span
desc: Specifies how many columns an element spans across in a multi-column layout.

name: column-width
desc: Specifies the optimal width of the columns in a multi-column element.

name: columns
desc: A shorthand property for setting column-width and column-count properties.

name: content
desc: Inserts generated content.

name: counter-increment
desc: Increments one or more counter values.

name: counter-reset
desc: Creates or resets one or more counters.

name: cursor
desc: Specify the type of cursor.

name: direction
desc: Define the text direction/writing direction.

name: display
desc: Specifies how an element is displayed onscreen.

name: empty-cells
desc: Show or hide borders and backgrounds of empty table cells.

name: flex
desc: Specifies the components of a flexible length.

name: flex-basis
desc: Specifies the initial main size of the flex item.

name: flex-direction
desc: Specifies the direction of the flexible items.

name: flex-flow
desc: A shorthand property for the flex-direction and the flex-wrap properties.

name: flex-grow
desc: Specifies how the flex item will grow relative to the other items inside the flex container.

name: flex-shrink
desc: Specifies how the flex item will shrink relative to the other items inside the flex container.

name: flex-wrap
desc: Specifies whether the flexible items should wrap or not.

name: float
desc: Specifies whether or not a box should float.

name: font
desc: Defines a variety of font properties within one declaration.

name: font-family
desc: Defines a list of fonts for element.

name: font-size
desc: Defines the font size for the text.

name: font-size-adjust
desc: Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs.

name: font-stretch
desc: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font.

name: font-style
desc: Defines the font style for the text.

name: font-variant
desc: Specify the font variant.

name: font-weight
desc: Specify the font weight of the text.

name: height
desc: Specify the height of an element.

name: justify-content
desc: Specifies how flex items are aligned along the main axis of the flex container after any flexible lengths and auto margins have been resolved.

name: left
desc: Specify the location of the left edge of the positioned element.

name: letter-spacing
desc: Sets the extra spacing between letters.

name: line-height
desc: Sets the height between lines of text.

name: list-style
desc: Defines the display style for a list and list elements.

name: list-style-image
desc: Specifies the image to be used as a list-item marker.

name: list-style-position
desc: Specifies the position of the list-item marker.

name: list-style-type
desc: Specifies the marker style for a list-item.

name: margin
desc: Sets the margin on all four sides of the element.

name: margin-bottom
desc: Sets the bottom margin of the element.

name: margin-left
desc: Sets the left margin of the element.

name: margin-right
desc: Sets the right margin of the element.

name: margin-top
desc: Sets the top margin of the element.

name: max-height
desc: Specify the maximum height of an element.

name: max-width
desc: Specify the maximum width of an element.

name: min-height
desc: Specify the minimum height of an element.

name: min-width
desc: Specify the minimum width of an element.

name: opacity
desc: Specifies the transparency of an element.

name: order
desc: Specifies the order in which a flex items are displayed and laid out within a flex container.

name: outline
desc: Sets the width, style, and color for all four sides of an element's outline.

name: outline-color
desc: Sets the color of the outline.

name: outline-offset
desc: Set the space between an outline and the border edge of an element.

name: outline-style
desc: Sets a style for an outline.

name: outline-width
desc: Sets the width of the outline.

name: overflow
desc: Specifies the treatment of content that overflows the element's box.

name: overflow-x
desc: Specifies the treatment of content that overflows the element's box horizontally.

name: overflow-y
desc: Specifies the treatment of content that overflows the element's box vertically.

name: padding
desc: Sets the padding on all four sides of the element.

name: padding-bottom
desc: Sets the padding to the bottom side of an element.

name: padding-left
desc: Sets the padding to the left side of an element.

name: padding-right
desc: Sets the padding to the right side of an element.

name: padding-top
desc: Sets the padding to the top side of an element.

name: page-break-after
desc: Insert a page breaks after an element.

name: page-break-before
desc: Insert a page breaks before an element.

name: page-break-inside
desc: Insert a page breaks inside an element.

name: perspective
desc: Defines the perspective from which all child elements of the object are viewed.

name: perspective-origin
desc: Defines the origin (the vanishing point for the 3D space) for the perspective property.

name: position
desc: Specifies how an element is positioned.

name: quotes
desc: Specifies quotation marks for embedded quotations.

name: resize
desc: Specifies whether or not an element is resizable by the user.

name: right
desc: Specify the location of the right edge of the positioned element.

name: tab-size
desc: Specifies the length of the tab character.

name: table-layout
desc: Specifies a table layout algorithm.

name: text-align
desc: Sets the horizontal alignment of inline content.

name: text-align-last
desc: Specifies how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned when text-align is justify.

name: text-decoration
desc: Specifies the decoration added to text.

name: text-decoration-color
desc: Specifies the color of the text-decoration-line.

name: text-decoration-line
desc: Specifies what kind of line decorations are added to the element.

name: text-decoration-style
desc: Specifies the style of the lines specified by the text-decoration-line property

name: text-indent
desc: Indent the first line of text.

name: text-justify
desc: Specifies the justification method to use when the text-align property is set to justify.

name: text-overflow
desc: Specifies how the text content will be displayed, when it overflows the block containers.

name: text-shadow
desc: Applies one or more shadows to the text content of an element.

name: text-transform
desc: Transforms the case of the text.

name: top
desc: Specify the location of the top edge of the positioned element.

name: transform
desc: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element.

name: transform-origin
desc: Defines the origin of transformation for an element.

name: transform-style
desc: Specifies how nested elements are rendered in 3D space.

name: transition
desc: Defines the transition between two states of an element.

name: transition-delay
desc: Specifies when the transition effect will start.

name: transition-duration
desc: Specifies the number of seconds or milliseconds a transition effect should take to complete.

name: transition-property
desc: Specifies the names of the CSS properties to which a transition effect should be applied.

name: transition-timing-function
desc: Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect.

name: vertical-align
desc: Sets the vertical positioning of an element relative to the current text baseline.

name: visibility
desc: Specifies whether or not an element is visible.

name: white-space
desc: Specifies how white space inside the element is handled.

name: width
desc: Specify the width of an element.

name: word-break
desc: Specifies how to break lines within words.

name: word-spacing
desc: Sets the spacing between words.

name: word-wrap
desc: Specifies whether to break words when the content overflows the boundaries of its container.

name: z-index
desc: Specifies a layering or stacking order for positioned elements.

name: animation
desc: Specifies the keyframe-based animations.

name: animation-delay
desc: Specifies when the animation will start.

name: animation-direction
desc: Specifies whether the animation should play in reverse on alternate cycles or not.

desc: Specifies the number of seconds or milliseconds an animation should take to complete one cycle.

desc: Specifies how a CSS animation should apply styles to its target before and after it is executing.

name: animation-iteration-count
desc: Specifies the number of times an animation cycle should be played before stopping.

name: animation-name
desc: Specifies the name of @keyframes defined animations that should be applied to the selected element.

name: animation-play-state
desc: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused.

name: animation-timing-function
desc: Specifies how a CSS animation should progress over the duration of each cycle.
